title: Part 2: Nimesh Patel + News (ACS August 25)
itunes:title: Part 2: Nimesh Patel + News (ACS August 25)
description:
Comedian Nimesh Patel returns to the show to talk about his new standup special ‘Thank You China’. He shares his experience being the first Indian American writer on ‘Saturday Night Live’, getting discovered by Chris Rock, and writing jokes for the Oscars. Gina Grad reports the news of the day including: Sylvester Stallone getting a divorce, Elon Musk saying he can prove Twitter counted fake accounts, Beverly Hills' Kitson Boutique banning masks, 'Curb Your Enthusiasm' being renewed for a 12th season, and Wall Street internet analysts comparing TikTok to crack cocaine. 

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:
